experience_data.title: Initial experience in design and web development
experience_data.description: Actively engaged in design. Took first steps in HTML, CSS, and also studied the basics of Pascal and C.

experience_data.title: Study of information systems and programming
experience_data.location: Voronezh, Voronezh State University of Engineering Technologies
experience_data.description: Studied business processes, design and life cycles of information systems in the specialty '09.02.07 Information Systems and Programming'. Studied databases (Access, MySQL), PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and phpMyAdmin under the guidance of a teacher. Got acquainted with Git, made pull requests to educational projects. Worked with GitKraken and created a personal GitHub.

experience_data.title: Design side jobs
experience_data.description: Worked in design, creating product cards for Ozon and Wildberries marketplaces. Worked with Photoshop, Figma and Wix. Continue to study React.

experience_data.title: Active study of React and educational projects
experience_data.description: More active study of React. Started developing educational projects.
